product_name: REI Endeavor Convertible Pants - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: Gear up for backpacking season with the REI Endeavor Convertible pants. They offer durability and performance with a classic fit to make all your adventures more enjoyable. Rugged double-weave polyester/spandex fabric provides 4-way stretch for excellent range of motion and comfort while climbing and hiking; fabric resists abrasion. Fabric is wind resistant up to 30 mph and has a Durable Water Repellent coating to help shed moisture; also dries quickly. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Worried about getting the legs muddy when you convert the pants to shorts? These legs are designed to separate down the sides so you don't need to pull them over your boots. Pants convert to shorts with "No-Sit" zips that allow quick conversions without requiring wearer to sit down. Color-coded thigh zippers help you easily tell the right leg from the left leg when converting back to pants. 2 hand pockets, 2 zippered cargo pockets, a rear zippered pocket and a rear rip-and-stick pocket give you all the space you need to stow trail essentials. Double-layer fabric at the knees and ankles stands up to abrasion. Polyester tricot lines the waistband to wick sweat and enhance comfort next to skin. Built-in webbing belt helps you fine-tune the fit. Leg shapes are engineered without adding seams to fit the body well and ease natural movement. Crotch gusset extends the range of motion. The REI Endeavor Convertible pants have a classic fit that's cut just right for easy wearing.
short_description: Gear up for backpacking season with the REI Endeavor Convertible pants. They offer durability and performance with a classic fit to make all your adventures more enjoyable.
